General.Name: Selva Gida Sanayi AS
General.Description: Selva Gida Sanayi AS engages in manufacture and sale of various food products in Turkey. The company offers various types of pasta, such as spaghetti, bucati, linguine, farfalle, pipe rigate, rigatoni elicoidali, ditaloni, farfalle toned, ditalini rigate, tagliatelle, sedanini rigate, short penne rigate, elbow, and fusilli; pastina; wheat flour; Anatolian flavors; quick cook pasta; bulgur; dessert and kitchen assistants; special flours; healthy products; premium products, including lasagna, squid ink spaghetti, and tagliatelle; organic products; and semolina. It is also involved in the catering business. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Konya, Turkey.
General.Address: Konya Organize Sanayi Bölgesi, Konya, Turkey, 42050
